message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll love it!
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer, but $150 is too high for me. I'd be willing to pay $80 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $80, but I need to make a profit. I can meet you in the middle at $110. What do you think?
I appreciate you coming down on the price, Alice. However, $110 is still a bit too high for my budget. Could you do $90? That would work for me.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I can offer it to you for $105. What do you think?
